columns.name: client_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the client, represented as a string

columns.name: company_name
columns.description: Name of the client's company, stored as a string

columns.name: industry
columns.description: Industry or sector in which the client's company operates, represented as a string

columns.name: annual_revenue
columns.description: The client's company annual revenue, including currency symbol where applicable, stored as a string

columns.name: contact_phone
columns.description: Phone number for contacting the client, potentially including international dialing codes, represented as a string

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Date when the client record was created, with varying formats, stored as a string
